thread.title: Trade war fears, Italian election buffet world shares

title: Trade war fears, Italian election buffet world shares
text:
Trade war fears, Italian election buffet world shares   01:41 
World stocks and emerging markets fell for the fifth straight day on Monday, hammered by fears of a global trade war and the prospect of political instability in Europe after inconclusive election results in Italy. Sonia Legg reports ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
World stocks and emerging markets fell for the fifth straight day on Monday, hammered by fears of a global trade war and the prospect of political instability in Europe after inconclusive election results in Italy.
